attributes.action: Support Prime Minister decision to prorogue Parliament & bring in Queen's Speech
attributes.background: I want to support the Prime Minister's decision to advise the Queen to prorogue Parliament and to bring forward a Queen's Speech on its return to sitting in mid-October.

rejection.details:
Petitioners are required to use a full name when submitting a petition.

You might like to sign this petition instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/269054
